name: A Pointless Existence
description:
This is our contribution to Godot WIld Jam # 35 (Lost Tech). Good luck, have fun!

CONTROLS:

  • Move with the arrow keys or WASD.
  • Press the space bar or just click to shoot. You shoot in the direction where the cursor is pointing.
  • Press E to pick up a gear when you are nearby, and E again to throw it when it gets too annoying.
  • Press X to self-destruct - if it's charged (don't worry, it's not really a self-destruction).
  • Press CTRL if you want to take another look at the items you have collected.
  • ESC to pause and unpause.

ATTENTION!!!

Please make sure you download both the .exe and the .pck file. And make sure that you have both files in the same directory when you run the .exe to play the game

And have fun, of course! ;)
